
# This trace file is for programming the bsg_tag
# Author: Paul Gao


# For flashing LED
0001_1000_00000000100110001001011010000000

# Wait for 100ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000000101
# Set CORE async reset to 1
0001_0010_000000_00_00_10_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 100ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000000101
# Set IO async reset to 1
0001_0010_000001_00_00_10_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 100ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000000101



# Set CORE async reset to 0
0001_0010_000000_00_00_01_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set IO async reset to 0
0001_0010_000001_00_00_01_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010



# Set tag_tdi to 1 for reset
0001_0100_000000_0100_000_0_0000_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 640ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000100000




# Init ALL osc clients
# Disable osc trigger registers
0001_0100_000000_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send all 1's to init
0001_0100_000001_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send all 1's to init
0001_0100_000010_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send all 1's to init
0001_0100_000011_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send all 1's to init
0001_0100_000100_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send all 1's to init
0001_0100_000101_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010



# Set tag_tms to 1
0001_0010_111111_00_00_00_10_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010





# Init ALL tag downsampler
# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000000_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000000_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000000_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000001_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000001_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000001_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000010_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000010_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000010_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000011_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000011_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000011_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000100_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000100_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000100_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Send stream of 1's
0001_0100_000101_0010_001_0_1001_00000_11111111_1
# Send stream of 0's
0001_0100_000101_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_1
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Send stream of 0's, payload not reset
0001_0100_000101_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010



# Set CORE OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000000_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000000_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000000_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set CORE DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000000_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set IO OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000001_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000001_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000001_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set IO DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000001_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set DFI2X OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000010_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000010_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000010_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set DFI2X DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000010_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set DRLP OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000011_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000011_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000011_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set DRLP DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000011_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set FSB OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000100_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000100_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000100_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set FSB DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000100_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set OP OSC payload to 15
0001_0101_000101_0001_000_1_0101_01111_00000000_0
0001_0101_000101_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_1
0001_0101_000101_0011_010_1_0001_00000_00000000_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010
# Set OP DS payload to 7
0001_0101_000101_0010_001_1_1001_00000_00000111_0
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010



# Set CORE to DS mode
0001_0011_000000_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set IO to DS mode
0001_0011_000001_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set DFI2X to DS mode
0001_0011_000010_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set DRLP to DS mode
0001_0011_000011_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set FSB to DS mode
0001_0011_000100_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010

# Set OP to DS mode
0001_0011_000101_01_10_00_00_000000000000000000
# Wait for 200ns
0001_1000_00000000000000000000000000001010



# For flashing LED
0001_1000_00000000100110001001011010000000

# End of testing
0011_0000_00000000000000000000000000000000
